sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import './details.css' class Details extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { edit: false, product: this.props.data.product } this.handleEdit = this.handleEdit.bind(this) } handleEdit(){ console.log(this.state) this.setState({ ...this.state, edit: !this.state.edit }) } render(){ const {product} = this.props.data return (
{!this.state.edit && (
Name:

{product.name}

Brand:

{product.brand}

Price:

{product.price}

Currency:

{product.currency}

Description:

{product.description}

Category:

{product.category}

Type:

{product.product_types}

Tags:

{product.tag_list}

Colors:
{product.product_colors.map(clr =>
)}
this.handleEdit()} value="Edit"/>
)} {this.state.edit && (
Name: Brand: Price: Currency:

{product.currency}

Description: Category: Type: Tags:

{product.tag_list}

Colors:
{product.product_colors.map(clr =>
)}
this.handleEdit()} value="Edit"/>
)}
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ data: state.product, }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, {})(Details)
